column2: set_prior("normal(2, 1)", class = "Intercept") + #based on mean growth from previous studies = 4, along with max and min
mu = identity; sigma = log; alpha = identity

sigma ~ Treatment + (1 | Atoll/Island)
         alpha ~ Treatment + (1 | Atoll/Island)

Draws: 4 chains, each with iter = 3000; warmup = 1000; thin = 1;
         total post-warmup draws = 8000

For each parameter, Bulk_ESS
and Tail_ESS are effective sample size measures, and Rhat is the potential
scale reduction factor on split chains (at convergence, Rhat = 1).
Using 10 posterior draws for ppc type 'dens_overlay' by default.
